system.prerequisites: Slaanesh Aligned, Psy Rating 4, Perception 40+, Lightning Reflexes
system.sustained:
Psyker gains +5xPsy Rating to Perception, Dodge, and Parry Tests. They inflict Zealous Hatred/Righteous Fury on a roll of 9 or 10.
They can also detect stimuli that are normally far too insignificant to be noticed (such as whispered words from a hundreds of metres away, or the indiviudal blades on a properller), or that would be subsumed amidst other noise (such as picking out a specific location on a complex map, a specific person from a crowd, eavesdropping on a conversation in the middle of a battle, etc). The exact bounds are subject to the GM.
The Fickle Nature of Chaos may see it that only fragments of information are caught as opposed to a full conversation if it is especially plot important.
